segments.text: I notice the angled view of this busy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is deeply concentrated on drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight through the window shows a lovely garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, the overflowing water catches my eye!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the sink edge like a river.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it calmly, unaware of the hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climb on the stool is thrilling to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's successfully reaching those cookies up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's instability fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate too; what if he drops it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her cookie with wide eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the scene perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside calm versus inside excitementâ€”fascinating contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I could watch this unfolding story all day.
segments.speaker: PAR
